div.head: 夜臥自驚
div.div: spontaneous fright during one’s sleep at night

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: spontaneous fright during one’s sleep at night

sense.def: Illness Sign of suddenly waking up in fright from sleep at night without apparent reason. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry long gu 龍骨：療心腹煩滿，四肢痿枯，汗出，夜臥自驚 , “It cures vexation and a feeling of fullness in the heart and abdomen; loss of function of the four extremities; sweating; spontaneous fright during one’s sleep at night ”.
